output_list.criticism: The setBalance function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary user's balance to any value, which can lead to loss of funds for the affected user.
The transfer function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can steal an arbitrary user's balance to any value, which can lead to loss of funds for the affected user.
The transferFrom function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can steal an arbitrary user's balance to any value, which can lead to loss of funds for the affected user.
